name: Blade & Blunt
description:
Yours is a perpetual trial by fire. Your abilities and inventory will determine your survival. If all else fails, your wit as a player shall not. Ultimately, you are only one choice, and a six-sided dice roll away from either disaster or glory.

BLADE & BLUNT is an easy to pick up 2d6 and 1d4 style OSR-lite TTRPG, with heavy emphasis on inventory management, risk taking and fast session-to-session progression. 

  • Grounded and fast character creation.
  • Low health and reactionary combat. Never wait to rejoin the fight!
  • Career based progression with hundreds of pathways.
  • Level your Skills every session, unlocking dozens of abilities.
  • Analogue inventory management, using physical item cards.
  • Unleash from five different elemental Runic magic types!
  • Classic ancestral character classes from older tabletop styles.
  • Easy settlement, army and caravan management and warfare!
  • Dozens of unique Bestiary creatures with rules to make your own.
  • Several modular and optional rules and playstyles.

Play-tested and inspired by the best mechanics and experiences from the RPG genre.
